english_example_sentence: The little child always carefully followed his old friend.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребёнок всегда внимательно следил за своим старым другом.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk, eski arkadaşını her zaman dikkatle takip ederdi.
